Introduction
This topic contains general information on claims for SC for radiogenic diseases under 38 CFR 3.309(d), including
presumption of SC based on participation in certain radiation-risk activities
history of presumptive SC based on participation in radiation-risk activities
, and
who is eligible for benefits under 38 CFR 3.309
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section A - Developing Claims for Service Connection (SC) for Disabilities Resulting from Ionizing Radiation Exposure Under 38 CFR 3.309
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section A
